REGISTER NOW

Thank you for registering, we are now processing your request. Kindly allow 4-6 weeks for the sample to be mailed to Malaysia registered address. For any assistance, feel free to contact us at 1800 – 88 – 3433 or email us at NestleHealthScience.MY@my.nestle.com

de.LABEL_46421486196215860_LABEL:

de-inf.LABEL_46421486196215860_LABEL:
Vielen Dank für deine Registrierung!

Wir bleiben in Kontakt.

default.LABEL_146640740380226600_LABEL:
Sign up to receive a FREE* sample kit of your choice (NUTREN® OPTIMUM / NUTREN® UNTUK DIABETIK).

Simply indicate your preferred product under 'Brand of Interest' and we'll mail the sample right to your doorstep.

NUTREN® OPTIMUM is a complete nutrition for adults to improve your nutritional status, muscle strength and gut health. NUTREN® UNTUK DIABETIK, a specialised nutrition for people with diabetes helps to keep you energised and manage blood sugar levels with ease.

*Applicable to first-time user. Each household is only entitled to redeem one (1) Nestlé NUTREN® Sample Kit within 12 months from date of sign up. Sample will be mailed to Malaysia registered address within 4-6 weeks.
default.LABEL_46421486196215860_LABEL: Thank you for registering, we are now processing your request. Kindly allow 4-6 weeks for the sample to be mailed to Malaysia registered address. For any assistance, feel free to contact us at 1800 – 88 – 3433 or email us at NestleHealthScience.MY@my.nestle.com
